content: I'll definitely try filtering by cause or charity on Active.com and RunningintheUSA.com to find events that support cancer research or animal welfare. Speaking of which, I've been involved in a few charity events recently, including the "Walk for a Cure" charity walk on May 15th, where I personally contributed $150 through sponsorships from friends and family, and a charity gala organized by my alma mater on May 8th, where I donated $200. I'm hoping to find more events like these that align with my values.
